content: make your version of this flared baby crochet dress using this pattern yarn - any dk-weight yarn can be used for this dress estimated yardage color a - 280 380 480 580 680 yards color b - 400 440 480 520 580 yards hook 4 mm crochet hook gauge 18 sts over 14 row = 4 /10 cm square made in half_double_crochet before blocking adjust hook size if necessary to obtain gauge difficulty level intermediate terms - us terminology size s and color codes - 0-3mths 3-6 mths 6-12mths 1-2 yrs 2-3yrs chest measurement 16 17 18 19 20 length of dress 12 12 14 14 16 construction notes 1 this dress is made in one piece with no sewing required 2 section 1 includes the yoke after which you need to split for the armpit opening 3 section 2 the body with ruffles made in 3 stages
